page.title: 10The Angel Inn
page.content: My name is Brigitte Jarvis, I am eleven years old and I live in a pub in Woolhampton run by my mum and dad. It is called The Angel Inn. It has a bar and a fuction room with skittle alley. It has two rooms for people to stay in. It has just been refurbished and we had a new restaurant built with a stain glass dome in the roof. We need a lot of food so we have got four fridges and four freezers. In the restaurant we usually take bookings but some people just come in and want a table and if we have a spare table we let them eat in the resturaunt.
